message:
Running command: applypatch << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: pylint/pylint/checkers/similar.py
@@
-        # Disable similarity check when configured with non-positive value
-        if self.min_lines <= 0:
-            return []
+        # Disable similarity check when configured with non-positive value.
+        # Historically the code treated 0 as a valid min_lines which caused the
+        # hashing logic to compute hashes of zero-length tuples and match every
+        # location against every other, producing spurious duplicates. Treating
+        # zero (and negative) as 'disabled' is consistent with other linters
+        # and user expectation: setting the option to 0 disables the check.
+        if self.min_lines <= 0:
+            return []
*** End Patch
PATCH
